divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on hwy.221 forest city north carolina, i turned onto chase high rd. and it appeared it was motionless at first but soon followed in persuite of me and my kids, i had never experianced anything like this. but my son yelled they are going to eat us! i have never seen him so paniced. so i gased it to my house it followed and hovered outside for about 10 minutes. it then vanished like a shooting star.
